name: Monochrome (crazyhairman)
description:
Do you have good control and tight reflexes? Then this platform game may be for you. Can you complete the 20 levels of this simple but difficult game? Do you think you can you defeat the boss at the end? If you do exceptionally well, you will unlock CHALLENGE MODE.

Controls: Arrow keys = Move; X = Throw Boomerang; R = Restart; P = Pause, numpad1/End Key = end your suffering
